title: New South Wales dog rapist, 43, who had sex with a golden retriever has his sentencing delayed
text:
A man who pleaded guilty to having sex with dogs including a golden retriever has had his sentencing delayed.

Dean Anthony Sellenthin, 43, pleaded guilty in July to 96 charges, including bestiality and stealing the underwear and swimwear of women and children.

Sellenthin had been due to be sentenced on Friday but his case will instead only be briefly mentioned ahead of a sentencing hearing on December 18.





A man who pleaded guilty to having sex with dogs including a golden retriever has had his sentencing delayed (stock image)

The 43-year-old did not apply for bail and it was refused.

Sellenthin's case was heard before Lismore District Court in August - when the prosecution and the defence were in the process of agreeing on a statement of facts.
description: Dean Anthony Sellenthin, 43, from Bangalow near Byron Bay, New South Wales, pleaded guilty in July to 96 charges which as well as bestiality included possessing child abuse material.
authors: Charlie Coë For Daily Mail Australia
